plot outline: Krishna Krishna is a 2001 Indian Telugu film, directed by S. Ve. Shekher and Produced by Media Dreams Ltd. The film stars S. Ve. Shekher, Sukanya, Venniradai Moorthy, Sriman and Chinni Jayanth in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by S. A. Rajkumar.
title: Krishna Krishna
plot: _Krishna Krishna_ (qv) is a 2001 Indian Telugu film, directed by S. Ve. Shekher and Produced by Media Dreams Ltd. The film stars S. Ve. Shekher, Sukanya, Venniradai Moorthy, Sriman and Chinni Jayanth in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by S. A. Rajkumar.
